surfit::oper_points Class Reference

matrix for approximation problem solving subject to scattered data-points More...

#include <oper_points.h>

vec * weights
 vector of informational weights
intvec * weights_cnt
 vector of informational weights (amount of weights)

Detailed Description

This matrix supports taking into account of following data-types:
  • wtask
  • wfunc
  • wiso
  • wcntr
  • warea
